issue.title: Joomla installation process problem with SQL server
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Each time component's options are saved or each time component is reinstalled (updated), all component's options are parsed and backslash characters are escaped with a backslash(!). 
This process adds in an exponential way some unwanted characters that can lead to reach database field's limit size or php memory limit size.
